about: A reimplementation of the default CKAN dataset schema

dataset_fields.label: Title
dataset_fields.help_text: The given name of a project or resource with data of interest; can be a collection of related data sets or files.

dataset_fields.label: URL
dataset_fields.help_text: URL link to the dataset landing page on the open data portal.

dataset_fields.label: Description
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: eg. Some useful notes about the data
dataset_fields.help_text: A short, summary description of what the data set or files are and what information is included in it. Often, taken directly from the source or provider.

dataset_fields.label: Tags
dataset_fields.help_text: Common terms that could be used to search for the data set or files; often more than one tag is used to describe a data set or file. Enter separated by commas or carriage returns. Acronyms acceptable. Use technical and non-technical terms. Use as many as needed. Use plural forms of the word, and also singular forms if different from plural (i.e. leaf/leaves, wife/wives)

dataset_fields.label: Geographic Unit
dataset_fields.help_text: The entire geographical designated place represented by the data set or file.

dataset_fields.label: Spatial Scale
dataset_fields.help_text: The geographic unit's measure of physical distance or spatial specificity of the data set or file. This can be the same as or smaller than the geographic unit.

dataset_fields.label: Time Period Covered (Start)
dataset_fields.help_text: The year or the start of the range of years represented by data set of file. Use years (YYYY), dates (YYYY-MM-DD), or dates and times (YYY-MM-DD"T"HHMMSS)

dataset_fields.label: Time Period Covered (End)
dataset_fields.help_text: The year or the end of the range of years represented by data set of file. Use years (YYYY), dates (YYYY-MM-DD), or dates and times (YYY-MM-DD"T"HHMMSS)

dataset_fields.label: Frequency - Data Change
dataset_fields.help_text: How frequently information is collected for the data sets or files.

dataset_fields.label: Frequency - Publishing
dataset_fields.help_text: Frequency with which dataset is published.

dataset_fields.label: License
dataset_fields.help_text: License definitions and additional information can be found at http://opendefinition.org/

dataset_fields.label: Data Steward Name
dataset_fields.help_text: The name of the individual employee or contact person responsible for the data set or file.

dataset_fields.label: Data Steward Email
dataset_fields.help_text: The email of the individual employee or contact person responsible for the data set or file.

dataset_fields.label: Data Steward Phone
dataset_fields.help_text: The office phone number of the individual employee or contact person responsible for the data set or file.

resource_fields.label: Description
resource_fields.form_placeholder: Some useful notes about the data
